subject: Retirement
lead_paragraph: Gene Upshaw, the executive director of the N.F.L. Players Association, has denied allegations that the union has improperly represented retired players and could owe them tens of millions of dollars.
snippet: Gene Upshaw, the executive director of the N.F.L. Players Association, has denied allegations that the union has improperly represented retired players and could owe them tens of millions of dollars.
